title: Search tool that only returns content created before ChatGPT's public release
author: dmitrygr
aiHeadline: Search tool tries to turn back the clock on AI, because apparently, the internet was better before ChatGPT ruined everything.

title: DeepSeek-v3.2: Pushing the frontier of open large language models [pdf]
author: pretext
aiHeadline: AI researchers release yet another overpowered language model, because the world clearly needs more ways to generate text that no one asked for.

title: Why xor eax, eax?
author: hasheddan
aiHeadline: Why would anyone ever write 'xor eax, eax' in assembly? Because clearly, the world needs more confusing ways to zero out a register.

title: Google Antigravity just deleted the contents of whole drive
author: tamnd
aiHeadline: Google Antigravity introduces a new feature: deleting your entire drive for fun and profit. Because who needs data when you can have a clean slate?

title: India orders smartphone makers to preload state-owned cyber safety app
author: jmsflknr
aiHeadline: India tells smartphone makers to preload government spyware, because nothing says 'cyber safety' like having the state monitor everything you do.
